article.headline: Beyond Meat expands Beyond Breakfast Sausage to thousands of additional stores
article.body: Beyond Meat Inc. BYND, +0.80% said Monday that it is expanding availability of its Beyond Breakfast Sausage Patties to thousands of additional stores nationwide, including Kroger Co. KR, +0.46% locations, Walmart Inc. WMT, +1.00% and Publix stores. Beyond Breakfast Sausage Patties were launched earlier this year. Last week, Beyond Meat launched Beyond Meatballs. Beyond Meat stock fell 2.7% in Monday premarket trading, but is up more than 97% for the year to date. The S&P 500 index SPX, +0.87% has gained 2.8% for 2020 so far.
